 1994-17201994-10-180EMR,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisAmendments to the URANIUM AND THORIUM MINING REGULATIONS which will require owners, operators or proponents of uranium mining facilities to provide satisfactory assurances to the Atomic Energy Control Board that adequate financial provision has been made for decommissioning their facilities in the interests of health, safety and the environment.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1994-0653 Publication Date: 1994-11-02
